name: 失落的王国:Lost Kingdom
description:
Become a dog


Play as the head of the Dog, a traveler in the Lost Kingdom, venturing to a place where birds don't shit! After curiosity to come to this kingdom, doghead must fight the darkness, solve the mystery, embark on the journey to the end.
"Lost Kingdom" is a unique action adventure big open world 2D platform jumping game, as an epic game, it has different characteristics, jumping feel is its most distinctive feature, traveler ah, go quickly to the mysterious kingdom, where there are magical and ancient secrets waiting for you!
